burgers: Hot and spicy chicken burger, smothered in buffalo sauce.
Spicy Meaty 1/2-pund hunk of meat on a sesame seed bun. If you want vegetables, go elsewhere.
Prepare your tongue, 'cause it's gonna be HOT! Perfect for traditional burger lovers who want a little kick.
A small slider with a little twang. Our lightest food option, but still with plenty of meat.
A chicken sandwich glazed with smooth honey. Don't worry; you wont have to explain where it comes from to your kids.
A swiss-cheese burger with so many mushrooms they take up more space than the burger! Perfect for those fungi lovers out there.
drinks: Grenadine syrup, ginger ale, and a cherry flavor to top it all off!
Tea that is sweet. A southern classic.
A strawberry/blue raspberry swirled slush perfect for the beach.
Sugar and bitters, mixed with high-quality whiskey.*
Something for the kiddos, or just for nostalgia.
sides: Beer-battered and crispy onion rings, with a satisfying crunch.
Thin, seasoned fries delicious with any burger.
A fried potato snack easy to enjoy with friends.
Scrumptious pickles covered in batter and cooked to crispy perfection.
Gutted jalapeños filled with cream cheese and cheddar, fried.
Crispy, fried, and battered bread filled with gooey, melty mozzarella. Served with marinara sauce.
